stories.title: U.S. Takes a Risk: Old Iraqi Enemies Are Now Allies
stories.author: MARGARET COKER
stories.description: In Iraq, the United States is training and sharing intelligence with former members of Iranian-backed militias that once fought and killed Americans..

stories.title: As Nuclear Sanctions Loom, ‘Normal Life’ Is Elusive in Iran
stories.author: THOMAS ERDBRINK
stories.description: Our correspondent walked the streets of Tehran after the United States withdrew from the Iran deal. “We have to go with the flow,” one man said.

stories.title: Haspel’s Testimony on C.I.A. Torture Raises New Questions
stories.author: CHARLIE SAVAGE
stories.description: Several statements by Gina Haspel, President Trump’s nominee to lead the C.I.A., at her confirmation hearing are attracting scrutiny.
